attributes.action: STOP FACEBOOK REMOVING OUR POSTS WITHOUT AN EXPLANATION AS TO WHY
attributes.additional_details: Facebook are not being fair, they are treating the right wing with contempt while letting the left wing woke do what they want. Our freedom of speach is also non existent for the right wing. We are even getting bans for trying to help people who are suicidal and want to talk to someone, they even remove posts of people asking for help. Surely this is not righ. What has happened to our freedom of speech
attributes.background: Facebook are removing our posts in groups without a proper explanation, they say posts have violated Facebook rules but do not say how and also will not let the admins see the post that's been removed. We want the Government to step in and stop this

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for Facebook
